title: Old player, new to boards, can't post
body: I can't find any explanation of how to meet requirements to enable me to post in other boards. I come in here and it offers only 2 places, and the boards in which I am restricted has no link to help me understand further. How do I gain permission? I'd like to post in the Clubs sub-board. Thanks.

replies.body:
Posting in H and S should sync your level (it is meant to be the same as in game). Try again now you've posted here and see if it's fixed.

Boards will soon be automatically syncing players regularly, reducing the confusion behind a lot of these errors :) Sorry for the inconvenience!
